result.execSummary:
The defendant Karly M Scott was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Receiving or Concealing Stolen Property (<=$2500) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.34(1)(a).
  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/cost on each count (Counts 2 & 3), for a total of $531.20, to be paid to the Clerk of Court's Office in a payment plan of $25.00 per month beginning 6/1/16 and due on the first of each month thereafter until paid in full.

$1,418.00, plus 10% surcharge of $141.80, for a total of $1,559.80 Restitution to be paid to Probation while on Probation in a payment plan of at least $25.00 per month.  Joint & Several with Cody J. Weeks (15CM126) & Nicholas Rabe (15CF170).
Must pay a $200.00 DNA surcharge to the Clerk of Court's Office as part of the payment plan of $25.00 per month beginning 6/1/16 and due on the first of each month thereafter until paid in full.
Must complete HSED or GED while on Probation.
Eligible for expungment upon successful completion of Probation.
Must undergo an AODA assessment and comply with recommendations.

timeConds.notes: Banked/stayed for use by Probation if necessary.
